name: Trans-Atlantic Parliamentary Group
goal: This organization has conducted meetings between MEPs and Members of Congress to work through issues such as trade, defense, etc., and build rapport and familiarity between the institutions. Meetings are hosted annually in Washington, D.C., via our organization, and periodically in Brussels. A limited scholarship for foreign affairs collegiate students is in development.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Trade negotiations, tariff disputes, NATO and related defense issues, energy, education and affiliated issues
